name: Introduction to Creative Writing
description: This course introduces students to the fundamentals of creative writing, including the writing process, literary elements, and genres.

name: Intermediate Creative Writing
description: This course builds on the foundations of creative writing established in Introduction to Creative Writing, exploring more advanced techniques and giving students more opportunities to write.

name: Advanced Creative Writing
description: This course further builds on the foundations of creative writing established in Intermediate Creative Writing, introducing more complex literary techniques and giving students more opportunities to write.

name: Writing for Digital Media
description: This course introduces students to the basic principles of writing for digital media, including web writing, blogging, and other forms of online publishing.
